welcome_message_body: Welcome to Petare, Venezuela! Get ready to immerse yourself in the vibrant culture, colorful streets, and delicious food this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Petare has to offer.

restaurants.name: Pastelería Pandoro
restaurants.description: Pastelería Pandoro is a bakery located in Caracas.
restaurants.address: Av. Francisco de Miranda, Caracas , Distrito Federal
